Gryffindor.description: You enter a warm common room, decorated in red and gold. A fire crackles in the fireplace, and students laugh together on the sofas.
Gryffindor.installation_message: ‚ú® Courage and loyalty are held in high regard here. Welcome to the House of Lions!

Slytherin.description: You discover a vaulted common room, illuminated by the green glow of the lake. Students watch you with curiosity and respect.
Slytherin.installation_message: ‚ú® Cunning and ambition are your allies. Welcome to the noble House of Slytherin.

Hufflepuff.description: You enter a cozy room, with walls covered in plants and magical herbs. The atmosphere is peaceful and welcoming.
Hufflepuff.installation_message: ‚ú® Patience and hard work are your greatest strengths. Welcome to Hufflepuff!

Ravenclaw.description: You arrive in a bright room, filled with books and enchanted maps. Discussions are already underway about Professor Flitwick's next riddle.
Ravenclaw.installation_message: ‚ú® Wisdom and curiosity will guide you. Welcome to the scholars of Ravenclaw.
